description: Amendments to planning permission dated 21st December 2023 (RN:23/07325/FULL) for Variation of conditions 1 and 5 of planning permission dated 19th September 2023 (RN:23/01936/FULL) for the variation of conditions 1 (approved plans), 4, 7 and 11 of planning permission dated 10th June 2022 (RN:21/07603/FULL) for the Excavation of basement beneath footprint of building and new side extension, replacement side extension at increased height plus addition of window and balcony, erection of new single storey side extension, replacement doors to rear and creation of window to side (north side), infill extension in part of front lightwell and installation of external stair in front lightwell, installation of plant equipment in front lightwell and rear garden and associated alterations. NAMELY, provision of doors in place of windows on rear elevation at second floor level, and associated use of flat roof over bay window as balcony, provision for a future planter over the ground floor entrance, and the installation of external lighting to the front and rear elevations/ gardens.
